name: UpdateFolderObjects
description:
Update specified folder objects in HubSpot CMS.

Use this tool to update the folder objects identified in the request body within the HubSpot CMS platform. Useful for batch modifications of landing page folder metadata.

parameters.name: folder_identifiers
parameters.description: An array of strings identifying folder objects to update in HubSpot CMS.

parameters.name: include_archived_folders
parameters.description: Indicate whether to include archived folders in the results. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Folders. Defaults to `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Folders. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Folders. Defaults to `false`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
